resources.string: "Cali is a Colombian city located in the department of Valle del Cauca, southwest of Bogotá. It is known for the salsa dance, of which there are many clubs in the Juanchito suburb. Some tourist sites in Cali are: Cristo Rey, Cali Zoo, La tertulia Museum, La Ermita Church, San Antonio Church,Surface: 564 km², Elevation: 1,018 m,Foundation: July 25, 1536, Mayor: Jorge Iván Ospina, Population: 2,228 million (2018), Weather: 26 ° C, wind from the W at 13 km / h, humidity 68%"
